name: Impactive (formerly Outvote)
headline: Political/civic tech helping progressive campaigns organize & mobilize
description:
Impactive, backed by YCombinator and Higher Ground Labs, was founded in 2017 as a get-out-the-vote tool for Democrats. The Impactive product has since expanded to become a full-service platform allowing any campaign or cause to engage in distributed organizing.

In the 2018 midterms, volunteers contacted over 1 million voters using Impactive. In 2020, we scaled significantly to meet the demand of this unprecedented election cycle. We‚Äôve worked with over 500 clients nationwide, and volunteers have sent over 100 million text messages on behalf of Planned Parenthood, the DCCC, SEIU, Community Change, When We All Vote, Greenpeace, and campaigns up and down the ballot. Our work has been featured in The New York Times, Washington Post, TechCrunch, Fast Company, and many more.

In 2021, Impactive will expand its platform further into nonprofit, advocacy, and additional markets. This will be an exciting time to play a critical role in helping shape the direction for what‚Äôs coming next. We will continue to prioritize our progressive values while building a feature-rich platform that will broaden our reach across the impact space.

founders.name: Naseem Makiya, Founder
founders.description: Naseem (he/him) is the founder of Outvote‚Äìa digital organizing platform for campaigns and causes. Outvote empowers volunteers to organize the people they know via text, email, and social media. Outvote then connects that work to the infrastructure of major campaigns and national organizations that have been doing similar work for decades. When he isn't pitching or writing code, Naseem can be found being a foodie with his wife, Pennylynn, and going on long walks with his dog, Lucy.

Data and Organizing Director,Indiana Democratic Party

Senior Director of Programming & Strategy,HeadCount

Youth Digital Campaigns Manager, League of Conservation Voters

Deputy Executive Director,Iowa Senate Majority Fund
#### "A tool like Impactive is a way that we can connect with friends and family members. It‚Äôs a way we can build a movement; it‚Äôs a way that we can get credit for the powerful organizing that‚Äôs happening."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/617ad055dd582e253c1c3f54/63a0c0bcf53360565447192a_1.png)

Co-Director of Electoral Power Building,Community Change Action
#### "Invest in this tool early! You don‚Äôt want to miss the window of efficacy for a relational persuasion program. Make the investment early so you can hit the ground running when you ramp up the campaign."

## Peer-to-Peer Texting
Organize at scale: upload a list of phone numbers to facilitate thousands of 1:1 text conversations per hour between volunteers and voters. Impactive clients have sent hundreds of millions of messages, with 99% platform uptime.
[Learn More![A black arrow pointing to the right.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/617ad055dd582e253c1c3f54/61949ee4fd46eab80d2a9a92_arrow-navy.png)](https://www.impactive.io/</solutions/peer-to-peer-texting>)
![An image of a sample Peer-to-Peer action hosted on the Impactive mobile app. The action is named "Text Voters about the Voter Suppression Bill," and the button reads "Start Texting". ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/617ad055dd582e253c1c3f54/63dac0ef5d2c8a819374fe7d_Compressed_P2P%20texting.png)
![An image of Impactive's results overview page on the admin dashboard.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/617ad055dd582e253c1c3f54/63a250ae42a0bd7131144584_Advocacy%20-%20Broadcast.png)
## BROADCAST TEXTING
Build your subscriber list with opt-in keywords, then blast broadcast texts with ActBlue donation links, event reminders, calls to action, and anything else worth sharing.
[Learn More![A black arrow pointing to the right.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/617ad055dd582e253c1c3f54/61949ee4fd46eab80d2a9a92_arrow-navy.png)](https://www.impactive.io/</solutions/broadcast-texting>)
## PHONE BANKING
Our groundbreaking predictive dialer offers unprecedented ease of use for admin and maximum call times for callers. Phone Banking on Impactive is what we wanted ‚Äî and couldn‚Äôt find ‚Äî from other dialers, built into our own tool.
[Learn More![A black arrow pointing to the right.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/617ad055dd582e253c1c3f54/61949ee4fd46eab80d2a9a92_arrow-navy.png)](https://www.impactive.io/</solutions/phone-banking>)
![An image of a sample Peer-to-Peer action hosted on the Impactive mobile app. The action is named "Text Voters about the Voter Suppression Bill," and the button reads "Start Texting". ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/617ad055dd582e253c1c3f54/63dac27b52f18e48f4b3c900_Compressed_Homepage_Phone%20Banking.png)
# Why Impactive?
üìà
## High-Performing
Our platform is trusted by leading organizations like DCCC and the League of Conservation Voters. With constant security updates and frequent security audits, you can trust that your program is safe with us.
ü§ù
## Relationship-Driven
We‚Äôre experts in providing tools that activate relationship-driven mobilization. Impact organizations of all sizes use our platform to connect to supporters and their personal networks to spark collective action.
üì≤
## Easy-to-use
Our tools are streamlined and easy to use for the ultimate admin and volunteer experience. Plus, our support team can help you customize Impactive to your program‚Äôs unique needs.

## Peer-to-Peer Texting
Organize at scale: upload a list of phone numbers to facilitate thousands of 1:1 text conversations per hour between volunteers and voters. Impactive clients have sent hundreds of millions of messages, with 99% platform uptime.
Learn More![A black arrow pointing to the right.‚ü®37‚ü©](https://www.impactive.io/</solutions/peer-to-peer-texting>)
![An image of a sample Peer-to-Peer action hosted on the Impactive mobile app. The action is named "Text Voters about the Voter Suppression Bill," and the button reads "Start Texting". ‚ü®38‚ü©]
![An image of Impactive's results overview page on the admin dashboard.‚ü®39‚ü©]
## BROADCAST TEXTING
Build your subscriber list with opt-in keywords, then blast broadcast texts with ActBlue donation links, event reminders, calls to action, and anything else worth sharing.
Learn More![A black arrow pointing to the right.‚ü®37‚ü©](https://www.impactive.io/</solutions/broadcast-texting>)
## PHONE BANKING
Our groundbreaking predictive dialer offers unprecedented ease of use for admin and maximum call times for callers. Phone Banking on Impactive is what we wanted ‚Äî and couldn‚Äôt find ‚Äî from other dialers, built into our own tool.
Learn More![A black arrow pointing to the right.‚ü®37‚ü©](https://www.impactive.io/</solutions/phone-banking>)
![An image of a sample Peer-to-Peer action hosted on the Impactive mobile app. The action is named "Text Voters about the Voter Suppression Bill," and the button reads "Start Texting". ‚ü®40‚ü©]
# Why Impactive?
üìà
## High-Performing
Our platform is trusted by leading organizations like DCCC and the League of Conservation Voters. With constant security updates and frequent security audits, you can trust that your program is safe with us.
ü§ù
## Relationship-Driven
We‚Äôre experts in providing tools that activate relationship-driven mobilization. Impact organizations of all sizes use our platform to connect to supporters and their personal networks to spark collective action.
üì≤
## Easy-to-use
Our tools are streamlined and easy to use for the ultimate admin and volunteer experience. Plus, our support team can help you customize Impactive to your program‚Äôs unique needs.

generated_description:
### Company Overview: Impactive (formerly Outvote)

**Name:** Impactive  
**Founded:** 2017  
**Location:** Boston, MA  
**Team Size:** 15 employees  
**Funding:** Backed by Y Combinator and Higher Ground Labs  
**Mission:** To empower progressive campaigns to organize and mobilize effectively through political and civic technology.  

---

**Background and Development:**

Initially launched as Outvote, Impactive was conceived as a straightforward get-out-the-vote tool specifically designed for Democrats. Over the years, it has evolved into a comprehensive platform suitable for any campaign or cause that values distributed organizing.

In the 2018 midterm elections, Impactive played a significant role, with volunteers reaching over 1 million voters. The 2020 election cycle highlighted their growth, serving over 500 clients nationwide and facilitating the sending of more than 100 million text messages for notable organizations such as Planned Parenthood, Greenpeace, and various electoral campaigns.

The platform has garnered attention from major publications such as *The New York Times,* *Washington Post,* and *TechCrunch* for its innovative approach to mobilization and engagement.

---

**Product Offering:**

Impactive provides a range of tools tailored to meet diverse organizational needs. Key features include:

- **Broadcast Texting:** Engage supporters with mass text messaging.
- **Peer-to-Peer Texting:** Volunteers can connect personally with voters through personalized text conversations.
- **Phone Banking:** Integrated features for efficient calling campaigns.
- **Event Organizing:** Tools to manage volunteer events seamlessly.
- **Fundraising Integration:** New ActBlue integration simplifies fundraising initiatives.

The platform also offers extensive program management capabilities, such as volunteer management, data reporting, and integration with other tools.

---

**Target Audience:**

Impactive serves a variety of organizations including:

- **Electoral Campaigns**
- **Advocacy Organizations**
- **Unions**
- **Nonprofits**

The versatility of the platform allows organizations to mobilize support for a range of initiatives, from member growth and fundraising to issue advocacy.

---

**Impact Metrics:**

- Over 1 billion messages sent since inception.
- Supported more than 350,000 registered volunteers.
- Engaged over 2,000 clients in 50 states.

---

**Recognition and Future Steps:**

With plans to expand into nonprofit and advocacy sectors further, Impactive is positioned as a pivotal player in shaping progressive mobilization strategies going forward. The ongoing commitment to building a feature-rich platform while adhering to progressive values is a testament to its mission-driven approach.

For more information, visit: [Impactive](https://www.impactive.io/).

---

This summary encapsulates the essence of Impactive: a forward-thinking company bridging technology with grassroots activism, enabling impactful organizing for progressive movements everywhere.
